climbs.name: Voldemort
climbs.fa: Logan Grosz, Mark Rafferty, Peyton Hinn & John Lang - March 2020

content.description: Share the same start as "Tom Riddle", and traverse right for a few moves. Then move straight over the bulge, grabbing a large jug to gain the left facing flake up high.
content.location: Far right side of wall. Same start as Tom Riddle.

climbs.name: Tom Riddle
climbs.fa: Mark Rafferty, Peyton Hinn & John Lang - March 2020

content.description:
Start matched on the obvious crystalized sloper and continue diagonally out right. Be sure to stay on your feet for the finish as young Riddle can be deceitful.

 Down climb the chimney out right for descent.
content.location: Located far right side of the wall.

content.description: An extension to Dobby , this traverse begins as a sit start. Climb this and become part of the “Society of the Promotion of Elfish Warfare”.

climbs.name: Parseltongue
climbs.fa: John Lang, Mark Rafferty, & Peyton Hinn, March 2020

content.description:
Share the same first couple moves of Exiting the Chamber, speak to the snake engraved door and exit right following the crack finishing on larger positive holds.

 Descent: Either make the long walk left to the beginning of the wall or down climb the chimney on the right.
content.location: Middle of the Horcrux wall, left of Voldemort.

content.description: SDS on the far right side of the main wall. Trend left through the rock scar to gain a sweet crimp-seam. Bust up to a large sidepull, mantle, and take the tall slab to the top. Don't fall on the slab, the landing is pretty sloped.Honestly, can't remember how hard it felt. It was in the realm of 8 or 9. Crimpy traverse into a crappy crimp and a punchy move..
content.location: Far right side of the main wall, just left of the downclimb chimney.

climbs.name: My Horcrux Is A Mobile Suit Gundam Wing Action Figurine

content.description: This one packs a punch! SDS matched on the undercling. Stand up, left hand sidepull, right hand crystal and hike up a high left foot. Bust up right hand to gaston. Crux is getting in and out of this move. Above the gaston is a left hand slope crimp rail and massive (but deceptively bad) right hand crimp crystal. Climb straight up to the top.
Start low on an obvious rail. k'REACH up for the large jug and continue up on a jug haul.
content.location: Far left side if the wall. One of the first routes you encounter from the approach.

content.description:
Start off with a left-hand undercling and high right-hand crimp. Make a couple of powerful moves out left to the higher crimps in the crack. Compose yourself and take a ride on the back of "Fawkes" to a large crystal and exit the chamber on easier terrain up and left.

 Descent: Either make a long walk left towards the beginning of the wall or downclimb the gulley out right.
content.location: A few feet left of Voldemort. Look for the small diagonal crack feature. Route exits out left.

content.description: Start matched on a large undercling. Smack up to sloper and traverse right to become a free elf.
content.location: Starts to the left of Kreacher on the same section.

content.description: Stand start right hand low in seam, left on face for balance. work up the seam for a few moves, then go up the face staying near the seam to the top.
This wall contains lots of potential for hard problems. The wall spans the entire length of the formation, with large slabby topouts.
